BugReport.Title: There is no menu item [Our global offices] in menu section [More] in selected languages
BugReport.Steps: "1. Navigate to capital.com", "2. Tap menu section [More]", "3. Select next lenguages (BG,CZ,DK,ET,GR,ES,HR,LT,LV,NL,PT,RO,SL,SK,FL,SE)"
BugReport.ExpectedResult: "There is a menu item [Our global offices] in all languages in menu"
BugReport.ActualResult: "There is no menu item [Our global offices] on (BG,CZ,DK,ET,GR,ES,HR,LT,LV,NL,PT,RO,SL,SK,FL,SE)"
